edu.ucla.sspace.matrix
Class TfIdfTransform

java.lang.Object
  edu.ucla.sspace.matrix.BaseTransform
      edu.ucla.sspace.matrix.TfIdfTransform
All Implemented Interfaces:
Transform
public class TfIdfTransform
extends BaseTransform

Tranforms a matrix according to the Term frequency-Inverse Document Frequency weighting. The input matrix is assumed to be formatted as rows representing terms and columns representing documents. Each matrix cell indicates the number of times the row's word occurs within the column's document. For full details see:

  • Spärck Jones, Karen (1972). "A statistical interpretation of term specificity and its application in retrieval". Journal of Documentation 28 (1): 11–21.

Author:
David Jurgens
See Also:
LogEntropyTransform
